summary: This is a big mod that complety changes Skyrim to the land of Middle earth. Races, Items, Locations, and Quests, all new!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND IS VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT[/size]

[size=2]
Now that I have that off my chest, welcome! This mod aims to change Skyrim, into Middle Earth! I am a huge LOTR fan myself and I never felt like there were any good, complete mods that made Skyrim very LOTR's like.[/size]
[size=2] [/size]
[img]http://images1.fanpop.com/images/photos/2300000/Map-of-Middle-Earth-lord-of-the-rings-2329809-1600-1200.jpg[/img]
This is Middle Earth and is what Skyrim is soon to look like with this mod.

[size=4]So what does this mod do?[/size]
[size=2]
Well currently... not much. [/size][b][u]It changes and adds races to resemble the races from LOTR[/u][/b][size=2]. The vanilla playable races in Skyrim were High Elves, Argonians, Wood Elves, Bretons, Dark Elves, Imperials, Kahjiits, Nords, Orcs, and Redguards! [/size][u][b]The races now are Dwarfs, Hobbits, Wizards, Haradrim, Lothlorien Elves, Mirkwood Elves, Mordor Elves, Dunedain, and Middle Men[/b][/u][size=2]. All these races are lore friendly to LOTR so with that in mind, [/size][b][u]Argonians and Khajiits are no longer playable[/u]. [/b][size=2]Sorry but there are no talking lizards or cats in LOTR.[/size]

[size=2] Another thing this mod does is add locations! (Whoa I just had some mad deja vu) [/size][b][u]It currently adds The Shire, Bree, Fornost, Mines of Moria, Rohan, Minas Tirith, The Black Gates, Erebor, and The lonely Mountain[/u][/b][size=2]. These locations are, more or less, in their correct locations from LOTR but [/size][b][u]none of these locations besides The Shire or Bree have anything there[/u][/b][size=2]. Don't worry, that's first on the priority list. [/size]

[size=2] This mod also [/size][b][u]adds Bag End[/u][/b][size=2], which is located in The Shire, [/size][u][b]and Bilbo Baggins who is in Bad End[/b][/u][size=2]. Yes Bilbo's face is messed up I know and yes he doesnt really look like Bilbo. Do you wanna try? [/size][b][u][size=2]It also adds The One Ring on the table by Bilbo. It currently doesn't do anything[/size][/u][/b]



[size=4]
Lets see, I think thats all for what the mod CURRENTLY adds, but what will it add?[/size]

[size=2][u][b] Firstly, I need to finish all the locations and actually put stuff there[/b][/u]. That's gonna be a long process but it wont be too hard.

 [b][u]I also want to add all the custom people from LOTR in their respective places. IE: Aragorn, Legolas, Gandalf, ect[/u][/b]. In the way future [u][b]these NPC's will be custom voiced[/b][/u]

The thing I'm most excited for are the quests. [b][u]There will be 3 main quests. One: the quest to reclaim the lonely mountain. Two: The quest to bring the ring to Mordor and destroy it. And three: the quest to find the ring, bring it to Sauron, and conquer Middle Earth.[/u][/b] You will only be able to do one of these last two quests so choose wisely! [u]There will also be some side quests, IE: take back Fornost, rid Mirkwood of evil, and hopefully something along the lines of restoring the Mines of Moria!

[/u][b][u] I also plan on adding alot of the items from LOTR. IE: Armor, Spells, Books, Minerals, ect.[/u][/b] I cant do that as of now because I simply dont know how to make custom textures and what. I plan on collaborating with some other modders that have already made mods that add LOTR items to Skyrim and then putting their items in my mod - if that made any sense. 

[/size][size=4]Why am I uploading this so early in development?

[/size] Simply put: I want you guys feedback. If I should changes any of the locations (or change anything else) I would rather know now than later just because that makes the process much easier. Oh and because I have and awesome Youtube channel that you should check out: https://www.youtube.com/user/GingaNinja12398
;)


I dont know what else to say but im sure im forgetting something...Oh well...


[size=4] [/size]
author: Me
